name: CMYK (Kichex, HikaruDaisuke)
description:
CMYK Is a  short Side-scroller, Dungeon Crawler, Shooter where you control a small and agile but powerful ship. You're protection the Black and White world from the Color, and your ship has been prepared for that! Change Between Cyan and Magenta to face against Enforcers and Hunters that will try to take you down.

Developed by Panaderia la 30
